title: Armor All Car Cleaning Wipes, Wipes for Car Interior and Car Exterior, 90 Wipes Each
description: Armor All Car Cleaning Wipes make it easy to keep your car interior clean with convenient car and upholstery cleaner wipes that work on your whole car. Grab these disposable wipes to remove ground-in dirt, dust and grime from every type of surface, including the dash, vinyl, leather, fabric, carpet and console. The interior car cleaner comes in lint free wipes that won't dry out, damage or fade surfaces to keep your car looking great. Simply grab the car detailing wipes and clean dirty surfaces in your car. These dust remover car wipes don't leave your hands feeling greasy, so you can wipe down your car anytime without worry. Each canister of car interior wipes comes with a Moisture Lock Lid to keep the car vinyl cleaner wipes fresh for at least a year. Help keep your car looking and feeling like new with Armor All.
